params.amount: The amount of margin to add.
params.user: The address of the user whose margin is to be added.

params.direction: The direction of the position to close.

params._priceOracle: Address of the price oracle contract.
params._settlementToken: Address of the settlement token contract.

returns._0: The current price as a uint256.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit.

params.user: The address of the user whose funding rate is to be paid.

params.direction: The direction of the position to liquidate.
params.user: The address of the user whose position is to be liquidated.

params.direction: The direction of the position (short or long).
params.margin: The margin amount for the position.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.

addMargin(address,uint256,uint8).notice: Adds margin to the specified user's position.

closePosition(uint8).notice: Closes the position (short or long) for the sender.

constructor.notice: Constructor initializes the contract with the price oracle and settlement token addresses.

currentPrice().notice: Returns the current price from the price oracle.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposits a specified amount of settlement tokens into the contract.

fundingRate(address,uint8).notice: Pays the funding rate for the specified user's position.

liquidatePosition(address,uint8).notice: Liquidates the position (short or long) for the specified user.

openPosition(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Opens a new position (short or long) with the specified margin and leverage.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws a specified amount of settlement tokens from the contract.
